segments.text: There will be a party in my company ; what shall I wear ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess it is a formal one because the general director will give a speech there , and most of the staff will take part in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , formal suit with a nice tie will be better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are right . What about shoes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The brown leather shoes are OK .
segments.speaker: S2
